query:
SELECT
                i.id as id,
                i.name as name,
                CASE WHEN i.default_unit_id is null THEN
                    null
                ELSE
                    (
                    u.id,
                    u.full_name,
                    u.short_name
                    )
                END as "default_unit: unit::FromDB"
            FROM
                ingredients as i
                LEFT JOIN units as u
                ON i.default_unit_id = u.id
            WHERE
                i.id = $1
